functions.name: SetAirControl
functions.description: Sets the amount of movement control allowed when it is in air

parameters.name: air_control
parameters.description: When falling, amount of lateral movement control available to the character. 0 = no control, 1 = full control at max speed of MaxWalkSpeed

parameters.name: boost_multiplier
parameters.description: When falling, multiplier applied to air_control when lateral velocity is less than boost_velocity_threshold. Setting this to zero will disable air control boosting. Final result is clamped at 1

parameters.name: boost_velocity_threshold
parameters.description: When falling, if lateral velocity magnitude is less than this value, air_control is multiplied by boost_multiplier. Setting this to zero will disable air control boosting
